Wolfpack Chronicles, pack histories and character stories of the starship captains in Wolfpack

Game Stats, for PixelStarships

Writer, ArchNadeom ( archnadeom@gmail.com )

Site Administrator, _sharky_

Pixel Starships is a strategy sci-fi MMORPG by game developers SavySoda, where you build and control your own starship and compete against other players online.

http://www.pixelstarships.com/

SavySoda built into their game a programmable logic, which they call AI, allowing you to predetermine how the different elements of your starship will operate during a battle. Its built-in limitations require an incredible degree of imagination and thought to make your ship behave the way you want.

It is a brilliant design mechanic. I have seen nothing like it in any other game. Because of the complexity involved in programming the logic, the game has become an intellectual playground for some of the most intelligent people I have met online.
